name: Avoid Programs with High Fan-In (EGL)
description:
This rule searches for all the programs having the number of incomming calls from other programs too high.
The threshold level is a parameter that can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Program having more than X incomming call links.
It provides the following information: Program full name, Nb of incomming call links.
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of incoming calls.
